de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher

Class DragGesture.Builder<GestureType,BuilderType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.DragGesture.Builder<GestureType,BuilderType>
  • Type Parameters:
    GestureType - The type of the drag gestures, which are created by the builder
    BuilderType - The type of the builder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PullDownGesture.Builder, SwipeGesture.Builder
    Enclosing class:
    DragGesture

    protected abstract static class DragGesture.Builder<GestureType,BuilderType>
extends java.lang.Object
    A builder, which allows to configure and create instances of the class DragGesture.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int threshold
      The threshold of the gestures, which are created by the builder.
      protected android.graphics.RectF touchableArea
      The bounds of the onscreen area, which is taken into consideration for recognizing the drag gestures, which are created by the builder.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Builder()
      Creates a new builder, which allows to configure and create instances of the class DragGesture.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract GestureType create()
      Creates and returns the drag gesture.
      protected BuilderType self()
      Returns a reference to the builder.
      BuilderType setThreshold(int threshold)
      Sets the threshold of the drag gestures, which are created by the builder.
      BuilderType setTouchableArea(float left, float top, float right, float bottom)
      Sets the bounds of the onscreen area, which should be taken into consideration for recognizing the drag gestures, which are create by the builder.
      BuilderType setTouchableArea(android.graphics.RectF bounds)
      Sets the bounds of the onscreen area, which should be taken into consideration for recognizing the drag gestures, which are create by the builder.

    • Method Detail

      • self

        @NonNull
protected final BuilderType self()
        Returns a reference to the builder.
        Returns:
        A reference to the builder, casted to the generic type Builder. The reference may not be null

      • create

        public abstract GestureType create()
        Creates and returns the drag gesture.
        Returns:
        The drag gesture, which has been created, as an instance of the generic type DragGesture. The drag gesture may not be null

      • setThreshold

        @NonNull
public final BuilderType setThreshold(int threshold)
        Sets the threshold of the drag gestures, which are created by the builder.
        Parameters:
        threshold - The threshold, which should be set, in pixels as a Integer value. The threshold must be at least 0 or -1, if the default threshold should be used
        Returns:
        The builder, this method has been called upon, as an instance of the generic type BuilderType. The builder may not be null

      • setTouchableArea

        @NonNull
public final BuilderType setTouchableArea(float left,
                                                   float top,
                                                   float right,
                                                   float bottom)
        Sets the bounds of the onscreen area, which should be taken into consideration for recognizing the drag gestures, which are create by the builder. drag gestures.
        Parameters:
        left - The coordinate of the left edge in pixels as a Float value. The coordinate must be at least 0
        top - The coordinate of the top edge in pixels as a Float value. The coordinate must be at least 0
        right - The coordinate of the right edge in pixels as a Float value. The coordinate must be greater than the coordinate of the left edge
        bottom - The coordinate of the bottom edge in pixels as a Float value. The coordinate must be greater than the coordinate of the top edge
        Returns:
        The builder, this method has been called upon, as an instance of the generic type BuilderType. The builder may not be null

      • setTouchableArea

        @NonNull
public final BuilderType setTouchableArea(@Nullable
                                                   android.graphics.RectF bounds)
        Sets the bounds of the onscreen area, which should be taken into consideration for recognizing the drag gestures, which are create by the builder. drag gestures.
        Parameters:
        bounds - The bounds, which should be set, as an instance of the class RectF or null, if the area should not be restricted
        Returns:
        The builder, this method has been called upon, as an instance of the generic type BuilderType. The builder may not be null
